So, at his very best, he is trying to adopt some of the new farming techniques to make his rice farm more productive and profitable. But this time, Lorenzo struggles with a shortage of capital, so he is asking for a loan of PHP 20,000.This amount will be used in his farmland preparation and in buying farm inputs to ensure proper plant care for his rice crop production.

He hopes that his farming business will further improve so he can gain a better income, which will serve his children’s education and the improvement of his living conditions.

loans.use: to be used in land preparation and for farm supplies needed in his rice field.

loans.name: Merlita

texts.en:
Merlita is married with four children who are adults. Using their own motorcycle, her husband generates income by offering a transportation service. They live happily in the village of Nagrumbuan. 

Merlita, on the other hand, manages her own general store where she is already using PHP 20,000 of revolving capital. Aside from this, she also sells fish around their village in the afternoon. She has been doing this type of selling for six years now and is used to earning a total of PHP 8,000 each month from her selling business. This has been invested towards the improvement of her current enterprise. 

Now, Merlita is requesting to borrow  PHP 30,000 to buy sacks of charcoal, bundles of firewood,  a gallon of gasoline, more cases of soda and alcohol as new product offerings to sell in her store.

loans.use: To buy charcoal, firewood, gasoline, soda and alcohol to sell.

loans.name: Amelia

texts.pt:
Solteira e mãe de 2 filhos que frequentam Escola, vive na casa própria com a sua família e não sustenta mais ninguém.
Tem um negócio próprio de venda de produtos diversos. Com este empréstimo pretende comprar material de construção (pedra, areia, cimento, ferro e outros) para aumentar a sua casa.
No futuro deseja concluir a sua obra e investir ainda mais no seu negócio, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é concluir a sua obra e fazer crescer a sua actividade comercial.
texts.en:
She's single and has two children who attend school. She lives with her family in a house she owns and doesn't support anyone else.
She owns her own business selling various products. With this loan she intends to purchase construction supplies (rocks, sand, cement, iron, etc.) in order to enlarge her house.
In the future she wishes to finish building her house and to invest even more in her business. For that reason she pledges to repay the loan as scheduled so that she can request more loans from Hluvuku.
The challenge she faces is finishing construction and expanding her business.

loans.use: to purchase construction supplies (rocks, sand, cement, iron, etc.) in order to enlarge her house.

loans.name: Armando

texts.pt:
Casado e pai de 3 filhos, apenas 1 frequenta Escola, vive na casa própria com a sua família e não sustenta mais ninguém.
É coordenador pedagógico numa Escola e possui um negócio próprio. Com este empréstimo pretende comprar mercadoria (mantas e lençóis) para aumentar a quantidade do seu produto e responder a demanda da sua clientela.
No futuro deseja abrir um centro de apoio a crianças desfavorecidas e alfabetização de adultos, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é conseguir fundos e continuar com a formação na área onde trabalha.
texts.en:
He's married and has three children, only one of whom still attends school. He lives with his family in a house he owns and doesn't support anyone else.
He's an educational supervisor at a school and also owns his own business. With this loan he intends to purchase merchandise (blankets and sheets) in order to stock up and meet his customers' demands.
In the future he wishes to open a center to support underprivileged children and promote adult literacy. For that reason he pledges to repay the loan as scheduled so that he can request more loans from Hluvuku.
The challenge he faces is obtaining funds and moving forward with his studies within his field of work.

loans.use: to purchase blankets and sheets for selling.

loans.name: Danilo

texts.en:
Danilo is the father of four. His wife stays at home nursing their grandchildren whose parents are working abroad as domestic helpers. To improve their general living conditions, he has been operating a motorcycle transport business in the city proper of Cauayan for almost 30 years. In this business, he is able to generate PHP 10,000 income monthly.

Danilo is requesting a loan of PHP 10,000 to pay for the repair and maintenance of his two motorcycles which are used in his transport business. His eldest son drives his second motorcycle for him so he can also earn income for his family.

loans.use: to pay for the repair and maintenance of his motorcycles.

loans.name: Esperança

texts.pt:
Solteira e mãe de 2 filhos, 1 ainda menor de idade para frequentar a Escola, vive na casa dos pais e não sustenta mais ninguém.
É docente e quadro do Ministério da Educação. Com o presente empréstimo pretende comprar material de construção (chapas de zinco, barrotes, ferro, cimento e outros) para dar continuidade com a obra da sua casa.
No futuro deseja voltar a Escola e mobilar a sua casa, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é liquidar o empréstimo e dedicar-se mais a outras actividades para aumentar a sua receita.
texts.en:
She's single and has two children, one of whom is still too young to go to school. She lives with her parents and doesn't support anyone else.
She's a teacher and a staffer of the Ministry of Education. With the current loan she intends to purchase construction supplies (zinc sheets, beams, iron, cement, etc.) in order to continue building her house.
In the future she wishes to go back to school and to furnish her house. For that reason she pledges to repay the loan as scheduled so that she can request more loans from Hluvuku.
The challenge she faces is repaying the loan and getting into other lines of work in order to increase her earnings.

loans.use: to purchase construction supplies (zinc sheets, beams, iron, cement, etc.) in order to continue building her house.

loans.name: Edgardo

texts.en:
Edgardo is happily married and has three children. Two of his children are already working, while the youngest is still studying. Edgardo is engaged in a farming business, particularly rice crops. He has been running this kind of business for ten years.

Edgardo is not yet satisfied with his little success, so he works tirelessly and with strong determination. Aside from farming, he also runs his hog raising business. Edgardo currently raised two sows. He had been involved in this kind of business for three years up until now. His priority is to increase the income he earns in order to support his child’s education and have a better way of living.

Edgardo is now requesting a loan of PHP 25,000, which allows him to buy necessary farm inputs such as fertilizer and insecticides, and for land preparation of his rice field. He hopes that his requested loan amount will be approved for him to attain his goal in life.

loans.use: to buy farm inputs such as fertilizer and insecticide, and for land preparation of his rice field.

loans.name: Raquel

texts.pt:
Solteira e mãe de 2 filhos 1 já maior de idade, vive na casa própria com a sua família e sustenta sua neta que vive com ela.
Trabalha no caixa de uma empresa e com o presente empréstimo pretende comprar um congelador para iniciar uma actividade comercial.
No futuro deseja apostar no negócio como forma de aumentar a sua receita mensal, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é conseguir financiamentos para poder iniciar a sua actividade comercial.
texts.en:
She's single and has two children, one of whom is already an adult. She lives with her family in a house she owns and also supports her niece who lives with her.
She works as a cashier for a company. With the current loan she intends to purchase a freezer in order to start a business.
In the future she wishes to invest in her business as a way of increasing her monthly income. For that reason she pledges to repay the loan as scheduled so that she can request more loans from Hluvuku.
The challenge she faces is obtaining loans so she can start her business.

loans.use: to purchase a freezer in order to start a business.

loans.name: Ngaet

texts.en:
Ngaet is 64 years old. She is widowed and lives with her two children in Takeo Province, Cambodia. She has been selling cakes for more than 10 years, earning approximately $2 daily. Her children are employed in the garment factory. They earn about $10 each day. 

Due to difficulties with her family’s transportation needs, Ngaet is requesting a loan of $1000 to purchase a motorbike for commuting. This purchase would enable her to use the money that she saves on her transportation expenses to support the family. In the future, she would like to run an additional business and rebuild her house to make it more comfortable for her family.

loans.use: to purchase a motorbike for commuting

loans.name: Dominador

texts.en:
Dominador has been cultivating his two hectares of rice field for one year. He is happily married with two children of whom the oldest child is still at kindergarten while his youngest child is an infant.

Dominador's wife has owned a retail store for one year. He is really glad because his wife is supportive and responsible. Dominador decided to start cultivating his rice field but he is sad because his capital for preparing his farmland and buying farm supplies is no longer enough. That's why Dominador is asking for additional working capital of PHP 20,000.  He knows that this would really have a great impact especially as it would make his farmland more productive and profitable.

loans.use: to prepare the land on his rice field and to buy farm supplies

loans.name: Simião

texts.pt:
Casado e pai de 2 filhos que frequentam Escola, vive na casa própria com a sua família e não sustenta mais ninguém.
É polícia e quadro do Ministério do interior. Com este empréstimo pretende comprar material de construção (areia, cimento, chapas, ferro, barrotes, e outros) para reabilitar a sua residência. 
No futuro deseja concluir a sua obra e casar oficialmente, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é a dificuldade de transporte para o local de trabalho.
texts.en:
Simiao is married and the father of 2 children who attend School, lives in his own house with his family and doesn't support anyone else.

He's a policeman and a permanent employee of the Ministry of the Interior. With this loan he plans to buy construction material (sand, cement, metal sheets, iron, beams and others) to renovating his home.

In future Simiao wishes to complete the work on his house and officially get married. To this end he commits to duly paying off the loan in order to solicit further loans from Hluvuku.

His challenge is the difficulty of obtaining transport to his place of work.

loans.use: buy construction material (sand, cement, metal sheets, iron, beams and others) to renovating his home.

loans.name: Zodaque

texts.pt:
Casado e pai de 2 filhos que já frequentam Escola, vive na casa própria com a sua família e não sustenta mais ninguém.
É técnico de informática numa empresa privada. Com este empréstimo pretende comprar produtos (arroz, feijão, leite, peixe, frango congelado e outros) para aumentar e diversificar a sua mercadoria. 
No futuro deseja concluir o seu curso superior, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é não conseguir ter fundos para adquirir mais produtos para o seu negocio
texts.en:
A married father of two children who are in school, he lives in his own house with his family and does not support anyone else. He is a computer technician at a private company.

With this loan, he will buy products (rice, beans, milk, fish, frozen chicken, and others) to expand and diversify his inventory.

In the future, he wishes to finish his college degree, so he is committed to dutifully paying off this loan in order to continue working with Hluvuku.

His challenge is that he does not have the funds to purchase more products for his business.

loans.use: to buy rice, beans, milk, fish, frozen chicken, and other items.

loans.name: José

texts.pt:
Casado e pai de 2 filhos que frequentam Escola, vive na casa própria com a sua família e sustenta mais um irmão e a mãe.
Trabalha nas relações públicas. Com este empréstimo pretende comprar material de construção (cimento, chapas, ferro, barrotes, e outros) para dar continuidade a obra da sua residência. 
No futuro deseja concluir a sua obra e melhor confortar a sua família, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é o pagamento devido do empréstimo para poder obter mais ate concluir a sua casa.
texts.en: José is married and is the father of two children who go to school.  He lives in his own home with his family and also supports a brother and his mother.  He works in public relations.  He will use this loan to buy construction materials (cement, metal sheets, iron, beams, etc.) to continue work on his home.  In the future, he hopes to finish his house to offer more comfort to his family.  To do this, he promises to make his payments on time so he can request more loans from Hluvuku.  His challenge is paying off the loan on time so he can obtain more loans to finish his house.

loans.use: to buy construction materials (cement, metal sheets, iron, beams, etc.) to continue work on his house.

loans.name: Eusebio

texts.pt:
Casado e pai de 2 filhos, ainda menores de idade para frequentar a Escola, vive na casa própria com a sua família e não sustenta mais ninguém.
É electricista de profissão e com o presente empréstimo pretende comprar material de construção (janelas, portas, barrotes, ferro, cimento e outros) para dar continuidade com a ampliação da sua casa.
No futuro pretende melhorar as condições habitacionais para a sua família e iniciar uma actividade de geração de rendimentos, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é conseguir um financiamento para poder responder aos seus projectos futuros.
texts.en:
Eusebio is married and the father of 2 children who are still too young to attend School, lives in his own house with his family and doesn’t support anyone else.

He’s an electrician by trade and with this loan he plans to purchase construction material (windows, doors, beams, iron, cement and others) to continue the expansion of his house.

In future he intends to improve his family’s living quarters and start an activity that generates income. To this end he commits to duly paying off the loan in order to solicit further loans from Hluvuku.

His challenge is to obtain financing to carry out his future projects.

loans.use: purchase construction material (windows, doors, beams, iron, cement and others) to continue the expansion of his house..

loans.name: Marilyn

texts.en:
Marilyn manages a business in which she makes and sells balut  (cooked fertilized duck eggs) in their village every afternoon. Every morning, she operates a buy-and-sell activity for empty bottles. To increase her daily income, Marilyn wants to expand further into tailoring thus she is requesting a loan of PHP 10,000 to buy fabrics. 

Marilyn's husband, on the other hand, drives their installment motorcycle that she uses in buying and selling empty bottles. Income generated from her businesses is going towards the expansion of their livelihood and monthly payments for their motorcycle. 

Marilyn is now 44 years old and is a mother to her only son who stopped his studies after graduation from high school. Next school year, she will send him to college to someday earn a degree, thus she is working hard to save some of her income for her son's tuition fees.

loans.use: to buy fabric for a tailoring business as an added source of income.

loans.name: Maria

texts.pt:
Casada e mãe de 4 filhos, alguns já maiores de idade, vive na casa própria com a sua família e não sustenta mais ninguém para além de seus filhos.
É negociante vende produtos alimentares diversos e com o presente empréstimo pretende comprar produtos (refrescos, bolachas, sumos, vinho, cerveja e outros) para aumentar e diversificar a sua mercadoria.
No futuro deseja comprar uma viatura para usar no seu negocio, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é criar uma estabilidade sólida no fornecimento de produtos aos seus clientes
texts.en:
She's married and has four children, some of whom are already adults. She lives with her family in a house she owns and doesn't support anyone else other than her children.
She's in retail and sells various foodstuffs. With the current loan she intends to purchase goods (refreshments, crackers, juice, wine, beer, etc.) in order to stock up and diversify her merchandise.
In the future she wishes to buy a vehicle to use in her business. For that reason she pledges to repay the loan as scheduled so that she can request more loans from Hluvuku.
The challenge she faces is becoming a solid and stable provider of products to her customers.

loans.use: o purchase goods (refreshments, crackers, juice, wine, beer, etc.) for selling.

loans.name: Rafael

texts.pt:
Solteiro e não tem filhos, vive na casa própria com a sua avó e não sustenta mais ninguém.
É negociante e dono do próprio negócio de venda de produtos diversos. Com este empréstimo pretende comprar produtos (amendoim, arroz, feijão, óleo, material de ginásio e outros) para aumentar a quantidade da sua mercadoria. 
No futuro deseja aumentar o volume do seu negócio e poder montar o seu próprio ginásio, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é a falta de fundos suficientes para realizar os seus projectos.
texts.en: Rafael is single and doesn't have any kids.  He lives in his own home with his grandmother and doesn't support anyone besides her.  He owns his own business selling various products.  He will use this loan to buy products like peanuts, rice, beans, oil, workout equipment, etc., to increase his quantity of merchandise.  In the future, he hopes to increase the volume of his business to be able to start his own gym.  To do this, he promises to make his payments on time so he can request more loans from Hluvuku.  His challenge is the lack of sufficient funds to carry out his projects.

loans.use: to buy and sell peanuts, rice, beans, oil, workout equipment, etc.

loans.name: Phol

texts.en:
Phol is 26 years old. She is married and lives with her two children in Takeo Province, Cambodia. She has been involved in growing rice and fattening up animals for more than five years, earning approximately $2 daily. Her husband runs a business which purchases junk materials to resell. He earns about $20 per day. 

Because their current motorbike is old, Phol is requesting a loan of $1300 to purchase a motorbike for her husband to transport junk materials. This purchase will help him to transport junk materials faster thus earning more income for the family. In the future, she would like to expand the business and send her children to a good school. Moreover, Phol hopes to build a new house as soon as possible.

loans.use: to purchase a motorbike for her husband to tranport junk materials

loans.name: Roda

texts.pt:
Casada e mãe de 5 filhos, vivendo apenas com os 4 que frequentam Escola, vive na casa própria com a sua família e não sustenta mais ninguém.
É operária numa empresa e com este empréstimo pretende comprar material de construção (pedra, areia, cimento, ferro e outros) para construir o murro de vedação da sua casa.
No futuro deseja concluir a sua obra do murro e aumentar mais um quarto na sua casa, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é conseguir fundos suficientes para poder realizar seus projectos.
texts.en:
She's married and has five children, and only the four of them who are in school live with her. She lives with her family in a house she owns and doesn't support anyone else.
She's a laborer for a company. With this loan she intends to purchase construction supplies (rocks, sand, cement, iron, etc.) in order to build a surrounding wall around her house.
In the future she wishes to finish building the wall and to add another room to her house. For that reason she pledges to repay the loan as scheduled so that she can request more loans from Hluvuku.
The challenge she faces is obtaining enough funds to implement her projects.

loans.use: to purchase construction supplies (rocks, sand, cement, iron, etc.) in order to build a surrounding wall around her house.

loans.name: Manuel

texts.pt:
Casado e pai de 4 filhos que frequentam Escola, vive na casa própria com a sua família e não sustenta mais ninguém.
É electricista numa empresa de segurança. Com este empréstimo pretende comprar produtos (amendoim, arroz, feijão, peixe, frango congelado e outros) para aumentar e diversificar a sua mercadoria. 
No futuro deseja desenvolver mais o negócio e tornar a sua família mais auto dependente, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é o baixo rendimento salarial, e conseguir ter fundos para adquirir mais produtos para o seu negócio.
texts.en:
A married father of four children who are in school, he lives in his own house with his family and does not support anyone else. He is an electrician for a security company.

With this loan, he will buy products (peanuts, rice, beans, fish, frozen chicken, and others) to expand and diversify his inventory.

In the future, he hopes to continue developing his business and to make his family more self-sufficient. Therefore, he is committed to dutifully paying off this loan in order to continue working with Hluvuku.

His challenge is his low income, as well as obtaining the funds to purchase more products for his business.

loans.use: to buy peanuts, rice, beans, fish, and frozen chicken, among other items.

loans.name: Acácio

texts.pt:
Viúvo e pai de 2 filhos que frequentam Escola, vive na casa de seus pais e não sustenta mais ninguém para além de seus filhos.
É negociante vende produtos diversos e com o presente empréstimo pretende comprar produtos (caldos, refrescos, sumos, vinho, farinha, arroz, cerveja e outros) para aumentar e diversificar a sua mercadoria.
No futuro deseja construir sua própria casa e sair da casa dos pais, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é tirar uma carta de condução para ter mais oportunidades de emprego
texts.en:
He's a widower and has two children who attend school. He lives in his parents' house and doesn't support anyone else other than his children.
He's in retail and sells various products. With the current loan he intends to purchase goods (broths, refreshments, juice, wine, flour, rice, beer, etc.) in order to stock up and diversify his merchandise.
In the future he wishes to build his own home and move out of his parents' house. For that reason he pledges to repay the loan as scheduled so that he can requer more loans from Hluvuku.
The challenge he faces is getting a driver's license so he can have more job opportunities.

loans.use: to purchase goods (broths, refreshments, juice, wine, flour, rice, beer, etc.) for selling.

loans.name: Guilherme

texts.pt:
Casado e pai de 3 filhos que frequentam a Escola, vive na casa própria com a sua família e não sustenta mais ninguém.
É segurança numa empresa privada. Com este empréstimo pretende comprar material de pintura (tinta, pincéis, vernizes, e outros) para a pintura da sua casa. 
No futuro deseja progredir profissionalmente e se formar em engenharia de construção, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é ingressar no ensino superior e seguir o curso almejado.
texts.en:
Married with three children who go to school, he lives in his own house with his family and does not support anyone else. He is a security guard for a private company.

With this loan, he will buy painting materials (paint, brushes, varnish, and others) to paint his house.

In the future, he wishes to make progress as a professional and study construction engineering. Therefore, he is committed to duly paying off this loan in order to continue working with Hluvuku.

His challenge is to enter higher education and follow his desired course.

loans.use: to buy painting materials (paint, brushes, varnish, and others) to paint his house.

loans.name: Roberto

texts.en:
Roberto works hard to earn his living. He is married with three children. Roberto just finished the elementary level of education. Despite his lack of knowledge in raising pigs and farming, he is still able to make his hogs healthy and is able to sell them for a  better profit. Roberto's earned profit was used to buy new pigs to raise.

Roberto aims to raise his pigs to be healthier and free from any diseases. To be able to attain his goal, he is requesting financial support from a  PHP 40,000 loan which will allow him to buy pig feed, vitamins and vaccines. He knows that,  through providing essential feed and vitamins to his pigs, he can obtain more profit which will serve his family's needs and enable him to educate his three children.

loans.use: to buy pig feed, vitamins and vaccines to ensure proper growth of his pigs

loans.name: Arminda

texts.pt:
Solteira e mãe de 2 filhas que frequentam a Escola, vive na casa própria com as suas filhas e não sustenta mais ninguém.
Trabalha como servente no hospital militar. Com este empréstimo pretende comprar material de construção (cimento, areia, ferro, pedra, e outros) para a construção do murro da sua residência. 
No futuro deseja concluir o murro, reabilitar a casa e ver as filhas formadas profissionalmente, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é o elevado custo de vida e o preço alto do material de construção.
texts.en:
She's single and has two daughters who attend school. She lives with her family in a house she owns and doesn't support anyone else.
She works as an orderly in a military hospital. With this loan she intends to purchase construction supplies (cement, sand, iron, rocks, etc.) in order to build a wall around her house.
In the future she wishes to finish building the wall, renovate her house and see her daughters get a professional degree. For that reason she pledges to repay the loan as scheduled so that she can request more loans from Hluvuku.
The challenge she faces is the high cost of living and the high prices of construction supplies.

loans.use: to purchase construction supplies (cement, sand, iron, rocks, etc.) in order to build a wall around her house.

loans.name: Gladys Obdulia

texts.es:
La socia continua con su negocio de tienda de abarrotes,la socia vende diferentes tipos de productos como arroz,azucar,leche,golosinas,gaseosas entre otros,la socia trabaja todos los dias desde las 08:00am hasta las 10:00pm aproximadamente,la socia lleva años en este negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada dia a su negocio.
La socia solicita el credito para la compra de mercaderia como gaseosas para su negocio.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
[Gladys] continues with her grocery business.  She sells different types of products such as sugar, milk, snacks, soft drinks, and other things.  She works every day from about 8:00am to 10:00pm and has had this business for years.  Things are going well, thanks to the effort she puts forth each day.

She is asking for this loan to buy merchandise such as soft drinks for her business.

She is happy about the loan and promises to make her payments on time.

loans.use: to stock her store.

loans.name: Guilhermina

texts.pt:
Casada e mãe de 2 filhas que frequentam a Escola, vive na casa própria com a sua família e não sustenta mais ninguém.
É negociante e dono do próprio negócio de venda de produtos alimentares. Com este empréstimo pretende comprar produtos (amendoim, arroz, feijão, óleo, e outros) para aumentar a quantidade da sua mercadoria. 
No futuro deseja aumentar o volume do seu negócio e poder ter um complexo, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é o pagamento devido do empréstimo.
texts.en:
She's married and has two daughters who attend school. She lives with her family in a house she owns and doesn't support anyone else.
She's in retail and owns her own business selling foodstuffs. With this loan she intends to purchase goods (peanuts, rice, beans, cooking oil, etc.) in order to stock up with merchandise.
In the future she wishes to expand her business and to own a store of her own. For that reason she pledges to repay the loan as scheduled so that she can request more loans from Hluvuku.
The challenge she faces is repaying the loan according to the schedule.

loans.use: to purchase goods (peanuts, rice, beans, cooking oil, etc.) for selling.

loans.name: Cesar Agusto

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “HUAYNA PICCHU”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

El socio es el Sr. Cesar; el socio continua con su negocio de fabrica de confeccion ,el confecciona diferentes tipos de polos,busos,casacas entre otros,el socio cuenta con un stand en uno de los centros artesanales de Cusco donde vende su mercaderia a sus clientes que le solicitan , a la vez tambien distribuye al por mayor su mercaderia,el socio lleva años en este negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada dia a su negocio.

El socio solicita el credito para la compra de telas al por mayor para su negocio.

El socio agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
This member belongs to the “HUAYNA PICCHU” communal bank. The bank is located in the district of Cuzco in the province and department of Cuzco. 

His name is Cesar; and he continues with his business making different types of t-shirts, sweatshirts, jackets and more. He has a stand in one of the artisanal craft centers in Cuzco where he sells his merchandise to his customers who order from him. He also distributes his merchandise wholesale. He has been in this business for years and it is going well for him thanks to to the hard work he puts into it. 

He is asking for th loan to buy fabric wholesale for his business. 

Cesar is grateful to the people who are a part of this dream in this way and he is committed to making his payments on time.

loans.use: to buy fabrics wholesale for his business.

loans.name: Pedro Jose

texts.es:
El socio continua dedicandose al negocio de pension familiar,el socio lleva años en este negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada dia a su negocio,el socio trabaja conjuntamente con su esposa preparando desayunos,almuerzos y cenas,el socio desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta forma seguir apoyando a su familia,el socio trabaja desde las 08:00am hasta las 05:00pm siendo de esta forma que el socio saca adelante a su familia.
El socio solicita el credito para la compra de aceite y arroz para su negocio.

El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
[Pedro Jose] is continuing with his family business and has been doing this for years.  Things are going well thanks to the effort he puts into his business each day.  He works together with his wife, preparing breakfasts, lunches, and dinners.  He wants to continue working like this so that he can support his family and works from 8:00am to 5:00pm and gets his family ahead this way.

He is asking for this loan in order to buy cooking oil and rice for his business.  He’s happy about the loan and promises to make his payments on time.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for his restaurant.

loans.name: Juana Elizabeth

texts.es:
La socia continúa en el banco comunal “Señor de Muruhuay” y con el negocio de venta y confección de chompas, ella en sus horas libres se dedica a la confección de chompas pero cuando no hay tiempo tiene   que comprar algunas chompas, ella distribuye a diferentes revendedoras de diferentes mercados sus productos.   

Requiere el préstamo para comprar las chompas y también para comprar materiales para tejer las chompas.

Agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
This member continues in the “Señor de Muruhuay” communal bank and with her business selling and making sweaters. In her free time she makes sweaters but when there isn't time she has to buy some sweaters. She distributes her products to different resellers in different markets.  

She requires the loan to buy sweaters and also to buy materials to knit the sweaters. 

She is grateful to those who are a part of this dream in this way and she is committed to making her payments on time.

loans.use: to buy sweaters and also to buy materials to knit sweaters.

loans.name: Walter

texts.es:
El socio es el señor Walter, él continúa dedicándose al negocio de carpintería metálica, fabricando estructuras como puertas, ventanas  escaleras, etc. Walter espera que con su trabajo y esfuerzo pueda ampliar el negocio de su taller y adquirir mejores y más modernas herramientas.
Walter solicita el crédito para comprar materiales como varillas metálicas, planchas de acero y herramientas para la producción de sus estructuras. El socio  agradece a KIVA por  el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Walter is a metalworker who makes items such as doors, windows, ladders, etc.  He expects that he will be able to expand his workshop and acquire better and more up-to-date tools through his efforts.

Walter is asking for this loan in order to buy metal bars, iron sheets, and tools for making structures.  He is grateful to Kiva for the loan and promises to make his payments on time.

loans.use: to buy supplies and tools.

loans.name: Custodio

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “HUAYNA PICCHU”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

El socio es el Sr. Custodio; El socio continua con su negocio de venta de artesania,el socio lleva buen tiempo en este negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada dia a su negocio,el socio cuenta con una tienda donde vende su mercaderia de textiles y mantas a sus clientes que le solicitan,el socio es una persona responsable y empeñosa siendo de esta forma que el socio saca adelante a su familia.

EL socio solicita el credito para la compra de mantas al por mayor para su negocio y para algunos gastos personales.

El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the “HUAYNA PICCHU” communal bank. The bank is located in the district of Cuzco, in the province and department of Cuzco.  

His name is Custodio. He continues with his business selling artisanal crafts. He has been in this business for some time and it is going well for him for him thanks to the hard work he brings to it every day. He has a store where he sells his merchandise of textiles and blankets to his customers who order from him. He is a responsible and dedicated person and this is the way he gets his family ahead. 

Custodio is asking for the loan to buy blankets wholesale for his business and for some personal expenses. 

He is happy with the loan and committed to making his payments on time.

loans.use: to buy blankets wholesale and to pay some personal expenses.

loans.name: Americo

texts.es:
El socio es el señor Americo, él es conductor profesional de vehículos motorizados y ahora continúa dedicándose a prestar servicio  de taxi, actividad con la cual  saca adelante a su familia y que representa el principal ingreso económico y sustento de su familia. Americo trabaja muy duro para ahorrar y poder acceder a comprar un vehículo nuevo, Americo solicita el crédito para dar el mantenimiento periódico a su carro y tenerlo siempre operativo ya que representa su principal herramienta de trabajo. El socio  agradece a KIVA por  el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuotas.
El socio pertenece al banco comunal "Los Diamantes" de la ciudad del Cusco - Perú
texts.en:
Americo is a professional motor vehicle driver and continues to offer taxi services.  In this way he is able to get his family ahead and this is his main source of income.  Americo works very hard to save up to be able to buy a new vehicle.  He is asking for this loan in order to do maintenance on his car and keep it operating at all times, as this is his main work tool.  He is grateful to Kiva for the loan and promises to make his payments on time.

He is a member of the “Los Diamantes” communal bank in the city of Cusco – Peru.

loans.use: to maintain his vehicle.

loans.name: Felicitas

texts.es:
La socia tiene 60 años de edad es viuda pero tiene cuatro hijos, ella pertenece al banco comunal “Señor de Muruhuay”. Su actividad económica principal es elaborar bocaditos y la venta de videos turísticos. Requiere el préstamo para comprar videos y también para comprar insumos como por ejemplo azúcar, harina, leche, huevos y otras cosas más. 
  
Agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
Felicitas is 60 years old. She is a widow but has four children. She belongs to the communal bank “Señor de Muruhuay.” Her main economic activity is producing snacks and the sale of tourist videos.

She requires the loan to buy videos and also to purchase supplies such as, for example, sugar, flour, milk, eggs, and other things.

She is thankful to those who form part of this dream by these means and she promises to complete the payment of her installments in the established period.

loans.use: to buy supplies such as, for example, sugar, flour, milk, eggs, and other things.

loans.name: Yahuar Maqui Group

texts.es:
Los socios pertenecen al banco comunal “YAHUAR MAQUI”; Este banco se ubicada en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Reyna Yamina ella es conviviente y tiene 41 años y tiene 3 hijos; La socia trabaja en su negocio de venta de ropa, la socia vende pantalones,chompas,polos y blusas, ella vende en forma ambulatoria repartiendo a sus amigas y público en general, la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 8:00 p.m,la socia ya tiene 7 años en este negocio y le va muy bien, la socia anteriormente se dedicaba al negocio de restaurant pero era muy difícil conseguir local y es por ello que decidió cambiar de negocio, el sueño de la socia es ampliar el negocio de venta de ropa. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar blusas, pantalones, polos y chompas.
 Los otros socios se dedican al negocio de venta de artesanía, negocio de taller de mecánica, negocio de restaurant y negocio de venta de tienda de abarrotes.

La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
The members belong to the comunal bank “Yahuar Maqui.” This bank is located in the district of Cusco, belonging to the province of Cusco and the department of Cusco.

Reyna Yamina lives with her partner, is 41 years old, and has three children. She works in her business selling clothes. She sells pants, sweaters, t-shirts, and blouses. She sells in mobile form distributing to her friends and general public. She works from 8:00 a.m. until 8:00 p.m. She already has seven years’ experience in this business and it is going very well for her. Previously she worked in a restaurant but it was very difficult to obtain a fixed location. Therefore, she decided to change the business. Her dream is to expand the business selling clothing. She is requesting the loan to buy blouses, pants, t-shirts, and sweaters.

The other members make their livings selling crafts, working in a mechanic’s shop, a restaurant, and a grocery store.

Reyna Yamina thanks those who form a part of this dream by these means and promises to complete the payments of her dues in the established period.

loans.use: to buy blouses, pants, t-shirts, and sweaters.

loans.name: Yenny

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “HUAYNA PICCHU”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Yenny;La socia continua con su negocio de compra y venta de artesania ,la socia vende lo que son chompas,mantas,polos,aretes,collares entre otros,la socia lleva buen tiempo en este negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada dia a su negocio,la socia cuenta con una tienda donde vende su mercaderia ella trabaja desde las 08:00am hasta las 07:00pm,siendo de esta forma que la socia saca adelante a su familia.

La socia solicita el credito para la compra de mercaderia como chompas de alpaca para su negocio.
  La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
[Yenny] is a member of the “HUAYNA PICCHU” communal bank, located in the Cusco district, part of the Cusco province and department.

Yenny continues with her artesian business, selling sweaters, blankets, polo shirts, and necklaces among other things.  She has been doing this for some time and things are going well for her, thanks to her daily efforts.  She has a store from where she sells her merchandise and works from 8:00 am to 7:00 pm and gets her family ahead in this way.
 
She is asking for this loan in order to buy more merchandise such as alpaca sweaters for her business.

She is happy about the loan and promises to make her payments on time.

loans.use: to buy merchandise.

loans.name: Tula

texts.es:
La socia tiene 50 años de edad es casada pero tiene tres hijos, ella pertenece al banco comunal “Señor de Muruhuay”. Su actividad económica principal es elaborar panes tradicionales de la región del Cusco para venderlos en la época navideña. Requiere el préstamo para comprar un horno eléctrico y para comprar insumos como por ejemplo azúcar, harina, huevos y otras cosas más. 
  
Agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
This member is 50 years old. She is married, but has three children. She belongs to the communal bank “Señor de Muruhuay”. Her main economical activity is to prepare traditional breads from the Cusco region to sell during Christmas time. She requires this loan to buy an electric oven and to buy consumables such as sugar, flour, eggs, and other things. 

She thanks whomever is a part of this dream through these means and she promises to comply with the payment of her dues on time.

loans.use: to buy an electric oven and to buy consumables such as sugar, flour, eggs, and other things.

loans.name: Zoila Rosa

texts.es:
La socia continua dedicandose al negocio de venta de artesania,la socia lleva buen tiempo en este negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada dia a su negocio,la socia vende lo que son gorros, chompas, polos,mantas entre otros,a la vez la socia continua realizando trabajos de arcilla ,ella trabaja desde las 08:00am hasta las 06:00pm,la socia es una persona responsable y empeñosa siendo de esta forma que la socia saca adelante a su familia.
La socia solicita el credito para la compra de mercaderia como chompas de alpaca, polos y mantas para su negocio.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
This member continues to sell folk-art. She has been in business for a while and her business is going well, thanks to the hard work that she puts into her business each day. She sells caps, blankets, polo shirts and sweaters among other items. At the same time she sells crafts made of clay. She works from 8am until 6pm. She is a hardworking and responsible worker. This is how she progresses with her family. She is asking for this loan in order to buy merchandise such as alpaca sweaters, polo shirts and blankets for her business.
She is happy to have this loan and promises to pay her payments on time.

loans.use: to buy merchandise for her business such as alpaca sweaters, polo shirts and blankets. L

loans.name: Guevara Elizabeth

texts.es:
La socia continúa en uno de los bancos comunales de la Asociacion Arariwa y con el negocio de venta de diferentes tipos de productos como jaboncillos, pasadores, cremas, cuerdas, lana y otras cosas más. 

Requiere el préstamo para mercadería como por ejemplo cepillos, jaboncillos, pasadores y otras cosas más. 
  
Agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
This member continues in one of the communal banks of the "Asociación Arariwa" and with the business of selling various types of products such as small bars of soap, hair clips, creams, strings, wool, and other things.

She requires this loan to buy merchandise such as brushes, small bars of soap, hair clips, and other things.

She thanks whomever is a part of this dream through these means and she is committed to make her installment payments on time.

loans.use: to buy merchandise such as brushes, small bars of soap, hair clips, and other things.

loans.name: Karina

texts.es: La socia es Karina, ella pertenece al banco comunal “LOS DIAMANTES” de la ciudad del Cusco - Perú, la socia continua con sus estudios universitarios de biología en una de las universidades de la ciudad, Karina es una joven  muy emprendedora y aprovecha las oportunidades para emprender algún negocio para ayudarse económicamente y apoyar también a su mamá, como en esta oportunidad que están próximas las fiestas de navidad, ella está solicitando un préstamo para comprar arreglos y adornos para la decoración de los hogares, todo con motivos navideños, por ejemplo luces de colores, árboles de navidad y adornos decorativos en general, Karina desea poder seguir estudiando y apoyar a su mama , por ello agradece a KIVA por  permitirle invertir en sus actividades complementarias las cuales representan un ingreso económico extra para su hogar.
texts.en: Karina is a member of the “LOS DIAMANTES” communal bank in the city of Cusco – Peru.  She continues to study biology at one of the local universities.  Karina is a very entrepreneurial young woman and is taking advantage of the opportunities to set up a business to help herself financially and also support her mother.  Since the Christmas season is approaching, she is asking for a loan in order to buy Christmas decorations and arrangements, such as colored lights, Christmas trees, and general decorations.  Karina wants to continue studying and supporting her mother.  She is grateful to Kiva for allowing her to invest in her complementary activities which represent an extra income for her home.

loans.use: to buy merchandise.

loans.name: Alejandrina

texts.es:
La socia continúa en el banco comunal “Señor de Muruhuay” y con el negocio de venta de sogas.  
Requiere el préstamo para comprar sogas al por mayor. Agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
This member continues in the “Señor de Muruhuay” communal bank and in the business of selling rope. 
  
She needs the loan to buy ropes wholesale. She is grateful to those who are a part of this dream in this way and she is committed to making her payments on time.

loans.use: to buy ropes wholesale.

loans.name: Victor Ceferino

texts.es:
El socio Victor Ceferino tiene 49 años de edad,casado y tiene 4 hijos,el socio se dedica al ngeocio de venta de medicinas naturales para la salud y vitaminas,el socio vende en forma ambulatoria llevando a sus amigos y publico en general,el socio trabaja desde 8:00 a.m ahsta las 5:00 p.m,el socio se dedica a este negocio 5 años y le va muy bien,el sueño del socio es tener un local donde pueda vender los productos naturales y vitaminas.El socio solicita el credito para comprar vitaminas y medicinas naturales.

El socio esta feliz con el credito y se compromete a cumplir los pagos.
texts.en:
Communal bank member Victor Ceferino is 49 years old. He is married and has four children. He has a business where he sells natural medicines for health and vitamins. He sells them as a walking vendor, taking them to his friends and to the public in general. He works from 8 am to 5 pm. He has had this business for 5 years and it is going very well for him. His dream is to have a shop where he can sell natural products and vitamins. He is applying for the loan to buy vitamins and natural medicines.

He is happy about the loan and promises to make his payments.

loans.use: to buy vitamins and natural products to sell

loans.name: Iris

texts.es: La socia es Iris, ella pertenece al banco comunal “LOS DIAMANTES” de la ciudad del Cusco - Perú, la socia continua con su labor como docente de la educación primaria en una de las escuelas de la ciudad y paralelamente estudia la carrera profesional de contabilidad  en una de las universidades del Cusco, Iris sabe que estudiando y actualizándose podrá procurarse un mejor porvenir y a futuro ofrecer una mejor vida a su familia.  La socia solicita el crédito para pagar sus estudios universitarios. Iris se siente agradecida con KIVA  por el crédito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en: This communal bank member is Iris. She belongs to the communal bank "Los Diamantes" (The Diamonds) in the city of Cusco, Peru. She continues with her work as a primary teacher in one of the city schools, and in parallel she is studying in the professional accounting program in one of the universities in Cusco. Iris knows that by studying and upgrading her skills she will be able to have a better future and in the future offer a better life to her family. She is applying for the loan to pay for her university studies. Iris feels grateful to Kiva for the loan offered and promises to make the scheduled payments.

loans.use: to pay for her university studies

loans.name: Nicolas

texts.es: El socio tiene 48 años de edad es separado de su pareja pero tiene dos hijos. Su actividad económica principal es brindar servicio de mantenimiento de carros pues es técnico en automotriz, el tiene un pequeño taller en un local alquilado donde repara los carros. En esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar repuestos como pistones, aceites, lubricantes y otras cosas más. Agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en: This member is 48 years old and separated from his spouse, but he has two children. His main economic activity is offering a car maintenance service because he is an automobile technician. He has a small workshop in a rented locale where he repairs the cars. At this time he needs the loan to buy replacements such as pistoms, oils, lubricants and more. He is grateful to those who are a prt of this dream in this way and committed to making his payments on time.

loans.use: to buy replacement parts such as pistons, oils, lubricants, and more.

loans.name: Clodomiro

texts.es: El socio continúa en el banco comunal “Señor de Muruhuay” y con la venta de productos de primera necesidad como arroz, azúcar, leche y aceite. En esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar mercadería como por ejemplo sacos de arroz, sacos de azúcar y otras cosas más. Agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en: [Clodomiro] continues with the “Señor de Muruhuay” communal bank and with his sale of primary needs products including rice, sugar, milk, and cooking oil.  On this occasion he needs a loan to buy merchandise such as sacks of rice, sugar, and other things.  He is grateful to those who form a part of this dream and promises to make his payments according to the established schedule.

loans.use: to stock his store.

loans.name: Juana

texts.es: La socia es la señora Juana, ella pertenece al banco comunal “LOS DIAMANTES” de la ciudad del Cusco - Perú, la socia continua dedicándose a la venta de productos de primera necesidad en su tienda de abarrotes, actividad que viene realizando hace muchos años y que representa el principal ingreso económico y sustento de su familia. Juana solicita el crédito para la compra de mercadería como arroz, azúcar, aceite, fideos, leche etc. para capitalizar su comercio. Juana está muy  agradecida con KIVA por el crédito y por ayudarla a continuar con su actividad económica.
texts.en: Ms. Juana belongs to “The Diamonds” Community Bank located in Cusco, Peru. She sells essential supplies from her grocery store. She has been doing this for many years. The income from this business is the main support for her family. She is asking for this loan in order to buy merchandise such as rice, sugar, oil, noodles, milk etc. so that she can restock her business. She is thankful to KIVA for this loan and for the continued economic support.

loans.use: to buy merchandise such as rice, sugar, oil, noodles and milk.

loans.name: Aida

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal HUAYNA PICCHU,este banco esta situado en el distrito de Cusco,provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.
La socia Aida tiene 43 años de edad tiene 02 hijos y es casada,la socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de confeccion de prendas como gorros,busos entre otros,la socia lleva años en este negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada dia a su negocio ,la socia confecciona su meraderia para luego distribuirlo a sus clientes que le solicitan,a la vez la socia se dedica a la venta de artesania,la socia es una persona responsable y empeñosa siendo de esta forma que la socia saca adelante a su familia.
La socia solicita el credito para la compra de telas al por mayor para su negocio.
La socia se siente agradecida por el credito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en:
[Aida] is a member of the “HUAYNA PICCHU” communal bank, located in the district, province, and department of Cusco.

Aida is 43 years old, married, and has two children.  She makes clothing articles such as hats, blouses, and other things.  She’s been doing this for several years and things are going well thanks to the effort she puts forth every day.  She makes her wares and later delivers them to her clients who place orders with her.  She also sells arts.  [Aida] is a very responsible and hardworking woman and gets her family ahead in this way.

She is asking for this loan in order to buy fabrics in quantity for her business.  She is grateful for this loan and promises to make her payments according to the established schedule.

loans.use: to buy fabric.

loans.name: Yovanna

texts.es: La socia es la señora Yovanna, ella pertenece al banco comunal “LOS DIAMANTES” de la ciudad del Cusco – Perú.  Yovanna se sigue dedicando al negocio de venta de artesanía, principalmente de elementos de joyería en plata como aretes, pulseras, collares, anillos, etc. y los comercializa en una de las principales ferias artesanales de la ciudad.  Yovanna realiza este trabajo hace algunos años, el cual representa su principal actividad económica y sustento de su familia. Yovanna está solicitando el préstamo para comprar mercadería y capitalizar su comercio para la próxima campaña navideña, por ello agradece a KIVA por ayudarla con el mantenimiento de su actividad.
texts.en: Ms. Yovanna belongs to “The Diamonds” Community Bank, located in Cusco, Perú. Yovanna continues with her business selling handicrafts, primarily silver jewelry such as earrings, bracelets, necklaces, rings, etc. She sells her work at craft fairs in the city. Yovanna has been in business for many years. The income from this business is the main support for her family. Yovanna is asking for this loan in order to buy merchandise in order to take advantage of the Christmas season. She is thankful for KIVA for the help they provide her with maintaining her business.

loans.use: to buy silver earrings, rings, bracelets and necklaces.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy cement, sand, blocks, paving stone, and iron

loans.name: Sussy Adriana

texts.es:
La socia Sussy Adriana tiene 50 años de edad es casada y tiene 4 hijos,la socia se dedica al negocio de venta de pinturas y aquarelas,la socia reparte a las diferetes librerias o tiendas,la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 7:00 p.m,la socia ya tiene 13 años en este negocio y le va my bien,el sueño de la socia es tener una libreria.La socia solicita el credito para comprar aquarelas y pinturas.

La socia esta feliz con el credito y se compromete a cumplir los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The mamber Sussy Adriana is 50 years old. She is married and has 4 children. She works in the business of selling paints and watercolors. She delivers to different bookstores or stores, working from 8:00 a.m. until 7:00 p.m. She has been doing this for 13 years and it is going very well for her. Her dream is to have a bookstore. She is asking for the loan to buy watercolors and paints. 

She is happy with the loan and committed to making her payments on time.

loans.use: to buy watercolors and paints.

loans.name: Ysabel Belen

texts.es: La socia tiene 56 años de edad es divorciada pero tiene tres hijos, ella pertenece al banco comunal “Señor de Muruhuay” de la Asociación Arariwa. Su actividad económica es brindar servicio de corte y peinado de cabellos, ella es cosmetóloga y tiene un pequeño salón de belleza. En esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar una secadora de cabello. Agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en: [Ysabel] is 56 years old, divorced but has three children.  She is a member of the “Señor de Muruhuay” communal bank of the “Asociación Arariwa.”  She is a cosmetologist and does hairstyles and cuts from her small beauty salon.  On this occasion she needs a loan to buy a hair dryer.  She is grateful to those who form part of this dream and promises to make her payments on schedule.

loans.use: to buy a hairdryer.

loans.name: Hilda

texts.es: La socia es la señora Hilda, ella pertenece al banco comunal LOS DIAMANTES” de la ciudad del Cusco – Perú. la socia continua dedicándose al negocio de comercialización de elementos de artesanía variada, la socia elabora, compra y vende elementos de imaginería, prendas de vestir tejida, utilitarios y adornos entre otros y los comercializa en los diferentes mercados artesanales de la ciudad, Hilda realiza esta actividad hace muchos años y esta le representa el principal ingreso económico y sustento de su familia, Hilda solicita el préstamo para comprar mercadería como chompas, adornos cerámicos, carteras de cuero y bisutería para capitalizar su comercio. Hilda se siente agradecida con KIVA por el crédito otorgado  y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de las cuotas establecidas.
texts.en: Hilda is a member of the “LOS DIAMANTES” communal bank in the city of Cusco – Peru.  She continues to sell arts.  She makes, buys, and sells imagery, clothing, decorations, and other things and sells them in different art markets in the city.  Hilda has been doing this for many years and it’s the main income in her home.  Hilda is asking for this loan to buy merchandise such as sweaters, ceramic decorations, leather wallets, and costume jewelry to stock her business.  Hilda is grateful to Kiva for providing the loan and promises to make her payments on schedule.

loans.use: to buy merchandise.

loans.name: Jovita

texts.es:
La socia Jovita sigue dedicandose al negocio de compra y venta de granos,la socia lleva años en este negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada dia a su negocio, la socia vende lo que son trigo,cebada entre otros,tambien la socia sigue dedicandose al negocio de venta de llantas y productos de ferreteria como venta de clavos,pinturas entre otros,la socia desea poder continuar trabajando para de esta forma seguir apoyando a su familia,la socia es una persona responsable y empeñosa siendo de esta forma que la socia saca adelante a su familia.
La socia solicita el credito para la compra de maiz al por mayor para uno de sus negocios.


La socia solicita el credito para la compra de trigo al por mayor.
texts.en:
Ms. Jovita continues with her business buying and selling grain. She has been doing this business for quite some time, thanks to the hard work she puts in each day. She sells wheat and barley among other grains. She also continues with her business selling tires and other hardware such as nails and paint. She would like to continue working, as this is how she can continue to support her family. She is a responsible and hardworking person. This is how she continues to help her family succeed. 
She will use this loan to buy corn wholesale for one of her businesses.
She will also buy wholesale wheat.

loans.use: to buy corn wholesale for one of her businesses.

loans.name: Cinforosa

texts.es: La socia es la señora Cinforosa, ella pertenece al banco comunal LOS DIAMANTES” de la ciudad del Cusco – Perú. la socia continua dedicándose al negocio de venta de comida en su puesto de expendio ubicado en un mercado de la ciudad, Cinforosa realiza esta actividad hace muchos años y esta le representa el principal ingreso económico y sustento de su familia, Cinforosa solicita el préstamo para comprar insumos como verduras, arroz, fideos, menestras, carnes etc. para la producción de sus alimentos.  Cinforosa se siente agradecida con KIVA por el crédito otorgado  y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de las cuotas establecidas.
texts.en: This communal bank member is Señora Cinforosa. She belongs to the communal bank "Los Diamantes" (The Diamonds) in the city of Cusco, Peru. She continues to work in her food business in a stand located in one of the city markets. Cinforosa has had this business for many years, and it represents her family's principal income and sustenance. Cinforosa is applying for the loan to buy ingredients such as vegetables, rice, pasta, beans, meats, etc., to produce her foods. Cinforosa feels grateful to Kiva for the loan offered and promises to make the established payments.

loans.use: to buy ingredients such as vegetables, rice, pasta, beans, and meats

loans.name: Maria

texts.es: La socia es la señora María, ella pertenece al banco comunal LOS DIAMANTES” de la ciudad del Cusco – Perú. la socia continua dedicándose a la enseñanza de diversas materias, dando clases particulares a niños que requieren refuerzo académico, María realiza esta actividad hace algunos años y esta le representa el principal ingreso económico y realización personal, ya que en un fituro ella quiere constituir una institución educativa inicial particular, María solicita el préstamo para comprar material didáctico como papelería, laminas, libros y software de computo para el desarrollo de sus clases.  María se siente agradecida con KIVA por el crédito otorgado  y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de las cuotas establecidas.
texts.en:
The member, María, belongs to Los Diamantes Communal Bank in the city of Cusco, Peru.  She continues making a living teaching various subjects, giving private classes to children who need academic support.  María has done this work for several years and it represents her main income and personal achievement because in the future she wants to start a private elementary educational institute.

María's requesting the loan to buy teaching materials such as paper, charts, books, and computer software to develop her classes.

María's grateful to Kiva for the loan granted, and she pledges to make her payments punctually.

loans.use: to buy teaching materials

loans.name: Marisol

texts.es:
La socia Marisol tiene 28 años de edad,es conviviente y tiene 2 hijos,la socia se dedica al negocio de fotocopiadora,la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 7:00 p.m,la socia tiene 8 años en este negocio antes la socia se dedicaba al negocio de restaurant pero no le fue muy bien,el sueño de la socia es ampliar el negocio de fotocopiadora.La socia solicita el credito para comprar papeles y tintas para la fotocopiadora.

La socia esta feliz con el credito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Marisol is 28 years old, is in a common law marriage, and has two children.  She has a photocopy business, works from 8:00am to 7:00pm, and has been doing this for eight years.  She used to have a restaurant but it didn’t do well.  She wants to expand her photocopy business and is asking for this loan to buy paper and toner.

She is happy about the loan and promises to make her payments on time.

loans.use: to buy paper and toner.

loans.name: Sonia

texts.es: La socia nació en la comunidad de Yanahuara de la provincia de Urubamba, ella tiene 42 años de edad, tiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene tres hijos, ella pertenece al banco comunal “Señor de Huanca” de la Asociación Arariwa. Su actividad económica es la venta de verduras, frutas, animales menores, granos secos y chicha de jora. En esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar granos secos como por ejemplo maíz blanco. Agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en: [Sonia] was born in the Yanahuara community of the Urubamba province.  She’s 42 years old, is in a common law marriage, and has three children.  She is a member of the “Señor de Huanca” communal bank of the “Asociación Arariwa.”  She sells fruit, small animals, dried grains, and chicha.  On this occasion she needs a loan in order to buy dried grains such as white corn.  She is grateful to those who form a part of this dream and promises to make her payments on schedule.

loans.use: para comprar granos secos como por ejemplo maíz blanco.

loans.name: Nazaria

texts.es:
La socia Nazaria se dedica al negocio de confeccion de casacas de cueros,la socia confecciona casacas y lo vende en forma independiente llevando a diferentes tiendas,la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m,la socia ya tiene 15 años en este negocio y le va muy bien,el sueño de la socia es ampliar el negocio de confeccion de casacas.La socia solicita el credito para comprar cueros  e hilos para confeccionar las casacas.

La socia esta feliz con el credito otorgado y se compromete c cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Ms. Nazaria sews leather jackets. She makes the jackets and sells them herself to different stores. She works from 8am until 6pm. She has been doing this business for the past fifteen years and it is going well. Her dream is to grow her jacket making business. She is asking for this loan in order to buy the leather and thread used to make the jackets.
She is thankful for this loan and promises to pay her payments on time.

loans.use: to buy the leather and thread used to make jackets.

loans.name: Rainer

texts.es: El socio es el señor Rainer, él pertenece al banco comunal LOS DIAMANTES” de la ciudad del Cusco – Perú. Rainer continua con su actividad como policía del estado, pero también apoya con el negocio familiar a su esposa, que es la venta de alimentos en su restaurante, actividad con la cual  saca adelante a su familia y que representa el principal ingreso económico y sustento de su familia. Rainer trabaja muy duro para sacar adelante su actividad complementaria y de esta manera  ofrecer un mejor futuro y educación a su hija, Rainer solicita el crédito para comprar insumos como verduras, fideos, menestras, arroz, carnes etc. para la producción de su restaurante. El socio  agradece a KIVA por  el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en: Rainer is a member of the “LOS DIAMANTES” communal bank in the city of Cusco – Peru.  Rainer works as a state police officer, but also supports his wife with the family business; a restaurant with which they get the family ahead and is their main source of income.  Rainer works very hard to provide a better future and education to his daughter.  He is asking for this loan in order to buy ingredients such as vegetables, noodles, rice, meats, etc.  He is grateful to Kiva for the loan and promises to make his payments on time.

loans.use: to buy ingredients.

loans.name: Brigida

texts.es: La socia vive en la provincia de Urubamba departamento del Cusco, ella tiene 46 años de edad es casada y fruto de esta hermosa relación tiene tres hijos, ella pertenece al banco comunal “Señor de Huanca” de la Asociación Arariwa. Su actividad económica principal es la crianza de animales menores y la venta de jora de chicha. En esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar maíz. Agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en: [Brigida] lives in the Urubamba province, within the department of Cusco.  She is 46 years old, married, and has three children.  She is a member of the “Señor de Huanca” communal bank of the Asociación Arariwa and raises small animals and sells chicha.  On this occasion she needs a loan to buy corn.  She is grateful to those who form part of this dream and promises to make her payments on time.

loans.use: to buy corn.

loans.name: Ubertina

texts.es: La socia vive en la provincia de Urubamba departamento del Cusco, ella tiene 32 años de edad es casada y fruto de esta hermosa relación tiene cinco hijos (Vane 17, celinda 16, Eulogia 12, Magda 10 y Yuliza 7 años de edad), ella pertenece al banco comunal “Señor de Huanca” de la Asociación Arariwa. Su actividad económica principal es la crianza de animales menores (Cuyes, chanchos y gallinas) y elaboración de chicha de jora. En esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar jora y gallinas. Agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
The member lives in the province of Urubamba in the department of Cusco.  She's 32 years old and married, and from this beautiful relationship has five children (Vane, 18, Celinda, 16, Eulogia, 12, Magda, 10, y Yuliza, 7).  She belongs to Señor de Huanca Communal Bank of Asociación Arariwa.  Her main work is raising small animals (guinea pigs, pigs, and chickens) and making "chicha de jora" [corn liquor].

She needs this loan to buy fermented corn and chickens.

She's grateful to those who are part of her dream through this loan, and she's committed to making her payments punctually.

loans.use: to buy fermented corn and chickens

loans.name: Luisa Amanda

texts.es: Doña Luisa de 54 años de edad, siempre haciendo la lucha vendiendo sus productos de plásticos junto a su esposo  en las distintas pulpería de la capital y en zonas francas, sus tres hijos cada vez van creciendo ya el mayor tiene 27 años quien ya trabaja y con sus ingresos ayuda en los gastos del hogar, sus préstamos los ha venido utilizando en mejoras de su vivienda en esta ocasión con este treceavo crédito desea continuar y esta vez necesita comprar zinc, perlines arena, piedrín, bloques, cemento, inodoro y sus accesorios para instalar servicio higiénico y hacer división de baño, para tener una vivienda más digna.
texts.en: Ms. Luisa is 54 years old. She sells plastic products along with her husband. She sells them to certain stores in the capital and the neighboring areas. Her three children are getting older. The oldest one is 27 years old and works. His income helps with the household expenses. This loan will be used to improve her house. With her thirteenth loan she will buy zinc, metal supports, sand, small stones, bricks, cement, an outhouse with its accessories in order to have hygienic services and a bathing area in order to have a proper house.

loans.use: to buy zinc, metal supports, sand, small stone, bricks, cement, an outhouse for hygiene and a bathing area.

loans.name: Aurelia

texts.es: La socia nació en la ciudad de Quillabamba pero vive en Urubamba, ella tiene 55 años de edad es casada y fruto de esta hermosa relación tiene tres hijos, ella pertenece al banco comunal “Señor de Huanca” de la Asociación Arariwa. Su actividad económica principal es la agricultura y ganadería pero también se dedica a la venta de verduras, frutas, animales menores y chicha de jora. En esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar abono y mangueras. Agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en: [Aurelia] was born in Quillabamba but lives in Urubamba.  She is 55 years old, married, and has three children.  She’s a member of the “Señor de Huanca” communal bank of the “Asociación Arariwa.”  She farms and raises livestock, but also sells vegetables, fruits, small animals, and chicha.  On this occasion she needs a loan to buy fertilizer and hoses.  She is grateful to those who form part of this dream and promises to make her payments on time.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and hoses.

loans.name: Raquel

texts.es:
La señora Raquel y su esposo el señor Tomas tiene cuatro hijos que están estudiando tres en la primaria y uno el preescolar. 
La señora Raquel se dedica al comercio de venta de útiles escolares, ropa y zapatos en diferentes partes de la ciudad desde hace seis años y su esposo el señor Tomas  es empelado del municipio de la ciudad.
En la colonia donde viven actualmente no cuentan con el drenaje, por lo que necesitan construir una fosa séptica, por higiene y seguridad de su familia. Es por eso que están solicitando un préstamo para la construcción de una fosa séptica (baño), ya que no cuenta con el dinero necesario para comprar el material y pagarle a la persona que se encargara de realizar la mejora.
Con las ganancias que obtiene la señora Raquel será para pagar el crédito y con el sueldo que obtiene el señor Tomas de su trabajo es para los gastos familiares y escolares de sus hijos.
Desea mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia y evitar enfermedades a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Raquel and her husband Tomas have four children who attend school; three in elementary school and one in the first year of preschool.

Raquel sells school supplies, clothing and shoes in different parts of the city and has been doing so for six years.  Her husband, Tomas, works for the city.

Her neighborhood currently does not have sewage and they need to build a septic tank in order to provide hygiene and security to their family, so they are asking for a loan because they don’t have the money to buy the supplies and pay the contractor.

Raquel will repay the loan out of her earnings.  Tomas’ salary is for the family expenses and children’s educational expenses.

She wants to improve her family’s quality of life and prevent her children’s sickness.

loans.use: to build a septic system.

loans.name: Rosa

texts.es: La socia nació en la ciudad de Maras pero vive en Urubamba, ella tiene 35 años de edad es casada y fruto de esta hermosa relación tiene cuatro hijos, ella pertenece al banco comunal “Señor de Huanca” de la Asociación Arariwa. Su actividad económica principal es la agricultura y ganadería pero también se dedica a la venta de verduras y animales menores. En esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar abono. Agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en: [Rosa] was born in Maras but lives in Urubamba.  She is 35 years old, married and has four children.  She is a member of the “Señor de Huanca” communal bank of the Asociación Arariwa.  She farms and raises livestock but also sells vegetables and small animals.  On this occasion she needs a loan to buy fertilizer.  She is grateful to those who form part of this dream and promises to make her payments on time.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer

loans.name: Engracia

texts.es: La socia nació en la provincia de Urubamba departamento del Cusco, ella tiene 33 años de edad es casada y fruto de esta hermosa relación tiene tres hijos, ella pertenece al banco comunal “Señor de Huanca” de la Asociación Arariwa. Su actividad económica principal es la agricultura y ganadería pero también se dedica a la elaboración de artesanía, crianza de animales menores (gallinas, cuyes y chanchos) y venta de verduras. En esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar gallinas. Agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en: [Engracia] was born in the Urubamba province, within the department of Cusco.  She is 33 years old, married, and has three children.  She is a member of the “Señor de Huanca” communal bank of the Asociación Arariwa and raises livestock, but also makes and sells art, raises small animals (chickens, Guinea pigs, and pigs), and sells vegetables.  On this occasion she needs a loan to buy chickens.  She is grateful to those who form part of this dream and promises to make her payments on time.

loans.use: to buy chickens.

loans.name: Miguel

texts.es:
El señor Miguel es viudo y tiene cuatro hijos a su responsabilidad, dos están estudiando la primaria y dos la secundaria, espera darle lo estudios necesarios a sus hijos para que sean unos triunfadores en el futuro.
Esta solicitando un préstamo para la elaboración de un piso de concreto en el patio de enfrente de su vivienda ya que esta en muy malas condiciones. Ya que no cuenta con el dinero necesario para comprar el material (arena y cemento) y pagarle a la persona que se encargara de realizar la mejora.
El señor Miguel trabaja para una compañía de trasportes en el aria coordinador de tráfico desde hace ya más de 5 años, es la fuente de ingreso y con la cual una parte será para pagar el crédito.
Desea mejorar el patrimonio y la calidad de vida de su familia y que su casa este en buenas condiciones.
texts.en:
Miguel is a widower with four children to care for.   Two of them are in elementary school and two in junior high school.  He hopes to be able to provide the necessary education so that his children can have a successful future.

He is asking for this loan in order to build a concrete floor in the patio in front of his home because the current one is in bad conditions.  He doesn’t have the money to buy the materials (cement and sand) and pay the contractor.
